document_data.name: Clarity of Mind
document_data.mainbody: '''''Clarity of mind''''' was a [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that warded against spells affecting perception.
document_data.Effect: The caster granted the subject the insight to defend against spells from the charm (''e.g'', ''[[charm monster]]''), compulsion (''e.g'', ''[[dominate animal]]''), or glamer (''[[disguise self]]'') subschools of [[magic]]. ''Clarity of mind'' also improved the likelihood of the target striking an opponent that had concealment from a glamer spell (such as ''[[blur]]'' and ''[[displacement]]'').
document_data.Components: It required somatic and verbal components, as well as a [[divine focus]].
